SA15arhebt2u:1018: asmākaṃ tu kathañcid bhedābhedavatāṃ dharmāṇāṃ tatsvabhāvatayā naiṣa doṣaḥ'; iti;

SA15arhebt2u:2306: yadyevaṃ ko 'yaṃ niyamo yadanekasmād bhavatānekena bhavitavyam viparyaye bādhakapramāṇābhāvāt,

SA15arhebt2u:2325: teṣūpayogataḥ tadupayogaiḥ bhinnasāmagrīvyāpāraiḥ kāryāḥ ye svabhāvaviśeṣāḥ- kāryāṇāṃviśiṣṭāḥ svabhāvāḥ teṣāmasaṅkarātparasparavyāvṛttarūpatvāt /

SA15arhebt2u:2369: pratyayanibandhanatayā svasantatipatitakāryaprasūtinimittaṃ tad upādānakāraṇaṃ yat santānāntare prāgavasthāpekṣaviśeṣodayanibandhanaṃ tat sahakārikāraṇam /

SA15arhebt2u:2370_1: janayantyaparaṃ ca santānāntaravyapadeśanibandhanamiti tasyā eva sāmagryā avāntaraviśeṣakṛtatvāccakṣūrūpavijñānakṣaṇānāṃ
SA15arhebt2u:2375: na ca tadabhyupagamyata iti na kācit kṣatiḥ /

SA15arhebt2u:2393: tatra mṛtpiṇḍād bhinnaḥ svabhāvo ghaṭasya ye tadanyopadānakāraṇatayā mṛtsvabhāvā na bhavanti vṛkṣādayastebhyo bhavati /
SA15arhebt2u:2394_2: tadanyebhyo yeṣāṃ mṛtpiṇḍastadanyanimittasahita upādānamiṣṭakādīnāṃ tebhyo bhinnaḥ svabhāvo bhavati /

SA15arhebt2u:2404: na mṛdaḥ kevalāyāḥ tatsāmagrībahirbhūtāyāḥ saṃsthānaviśeṣaḥ kulālopādānopakṛtāyā eva mṛtsaṃsthānaviśeṣātmakakāryahetutvāt /

SA15arhebt2u:2429: sarvatraiva hi dravyaparyāyayoḥ saṅkhayāsaṃjñālakṣaṇakāryabhedād bhedo deśakālasvabhāvābhedāccābheda iṣyate,

SA15arhebt2u:2535: ekasyānekakriyānabhyupagame ca yo 'yaṃ rūparasagandhasparśaviśeṣāṇāṃ kvacit sahabhāvaniyamaḥ pramāṇaparidṛṣṭaḥ sa na syāt /
SA15arhebt2u:2541: anekenaikasvabhāvatāṃ cānubhavataḥ tadvadanekatāyā durnivāratvāt anyathā dharmadharmiṇāṃ kathaṃ (Hbṭ 102)

SA15arhebt2u:2560_0: vaiśeṣiko 'pi dravyasyaikasya dravyaguṇakarmaṇāṃ samavāyikāraṇatāṃ bruvāṇaḥ karmaṇaścaikasya
SA15arhebt2u:2569: tathā hi- deśakālayorabhede 'pi rūparasagandhasparśāḥ paryāyarūpeṇa bhidyante tataḥ kathamabhedasiddhiḥ? /
SA15arhebt2u:2579: anuvṛttivyāvṛttyośca svabhāvatve lakṣaṇāt svabhāvasya bhedo vaktavyaḥ /

SA15arhebt2u:2590: kathaṃ tarhi sa eka ityucyate anekaḥ san? /
SA15arhebt2u:2597: yogyatvācca viśvasya kṛtākṛtānāmekābhidhānābhidheyatvasya kvacidasambhavāt śaktibhedācca viṣayabhedaṃ brūvāṇaṃ prati abhihitam /
SA15arhebt2u:2600: tathā hi- śaśāṅkodayaṃ bahavo nirīkṣante tasya kathamekatvamabhyupagatam? /
SA15arhebt2u:2602: sarvathedaṃ na kathañcidapi saṅgacchate yaduta ekasya dvairūpyamiti /

SA15arhebt2u:2605: atha punardravyaparyāyayoḥ sammūrcchitatvāt narasiṃhavadekaṃ śabalarūpatvāt dvīrūpamucyate /
SA15arhebt2u:2609: te ca paramāṇavaḥ pratyekaṃ narasiṃharūpā na bhavanti,
SA15arhebt2u:2612: jātyantaraṃ ca sa eva narasiṃhābhyāṃ syāt,
SA15arhebt2u:2617: iti kevalamanekatve 'pi bahuṣvekakāryadarśanāt senādivadekavyavahāradarśanakṛto 'yaṃ viparyāso jaḍamatīnām /
SA15arhebt2u:2620: tathā hi paryāyā abhinnadeśakālasvabhāvāśca paryāyarūpeṇa ca bhidyante pūrvoktācca dharmadharmiṇorniṣedhānnobhayavādasambhava iti /
SA15arhebt2u:2650: bhinnaṃ paryāyarūpaṃ hi dravyarūpād bhaved yadi // 10 //
SA15arhebt2u:2651: tadaitat syādabhede tu naitat saṃbadhyate vacaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:2657: svabhāvasyaiva bhedena kiṃ bhedaśca na kīrtitaḥ? /

SA15arhebt2u:3963: syādetat- yo hyatādṛśādapi tādṛśodbhavamicchati tasya bhedābhedayorahetukatvamiṣṭameva bhāvā eva kevalaṃ hetumanta ityata āha- “tadvyatiriktaśca” ityādi /
SA15arhebt2u:3964: nahi bhedābhedavyatiriktaḥ kaścid bhāvānāṃ svabhāvo 'sti yastayorahetukatve 'pi hetumān syāt /
SA15arhebt2u:3969: ananyatve 'pi bhedābhedayorbhāvasvabhāvasya ca svātmanyevāvasthānāt anupakārācca kutaḥ sambandhitā? /
SA15arhebt2u:3970: upakārakalpanāyāṃ ca yadi bhāvasvabhāvaḥ svahetubhya eva na kutaścid bhinno 'bhinno vā samutpanna itīṣyate,
SA15arhebt2u:3971: tadā tadbhāve 'pi svabhāvānyathātvābhāvāt kuto bhinnābhinnatā bhāvasvabhāvasya syāt? /
SA15arhebt2u:3974: tāvapi yadi bhinnau tadā bhāvasvabhāvastadavastha eveti na tasya kutaścit svarūpato bhedo 'bhedo vā syāt /
SA15arhebt2u:3975: punastadvaśād bhedābhedakalpanāyāṃ bhāvasvabhāvasya tadavasthaṃ tādavasthyamanavasthā ca bhedābhedayoḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:3976: athābhinnau tadā bhāvasvabhāva eva bhedābhedābhyāṃ kriyata iti syāt,
SA15arhebt2u:3978: vāt; tasya ca hetvantarāt paścād bhavatastato 'nyatvāpatteḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:3981: svahetubhya eva bhāvasvabhāvasya kutaścid bhinnābhinnātmana utpattikalpanāyāṃ vā bhedābhedayorvyatirekavatoḥ vaiyarthyam;
SA15arhebt2u:3983: tasmād vaiśeṣikādikalpitayorbhedābhedayorviśeṣasāmānyātmanorayogāt bhāvasvabhāva eva bhedābhedaśabdavācyaḥ tayorahetukatve bhāvasvabhāvasyaivāhetukatvamāpatitam /
SA15arhebt2u:3985: ahetukatve hi bhāvānāṃ yadi kadācit sattvaṃ sarvadaiva syāt /
SA15arhebt2u:3990: yasmā “dapekṣayā hi” tasyāpeṣaṇīyasya hetorbhāve bhavanto 'bhāve ca na bhavantaḥ “kādācitkāḥ” kadācidbhavā yujyante,
SA15arhebt2u:3994_0: punarapi vilakṣaṇāyāḥ sāmagryāḥ avilakṣaṇasya kāryasyotpattau doṣāntaramāha- “vyavasthāvāṃśca”
SA15arhebt2u:3994_2: ghaṭārthī mṛtpiṇḍameva tatra niyuṅkte na tantūn,
SA15arhebt2u:3995: paṭārthī ca tantūneva na mṛtpiṇḍam ityādikaḥ sa na syāt /
SA15arhebt2u:3996: kasmāt? ityāha- “kāraṇānāṃ“- sāmagrīṇāṃ yāḥ “śaktayaḥ“- ātmātiśayalakṣaṇāstāsāṃ “pratīniyame” kācideva sāmagrī kvacideva (Hbṭ 165)
SA15arhebt2u:3997: kārye upayujyate nānyānyatretyevaṃrūpe “hi” yasmāt “kiñcideva” mṛdādikaṃ “kasyacideva” ghaṭādeḥ sādhanāyopādīyate “nāparaṃ” tadvilakṣaṇaṃ tantvādikam kasmādevam?
SA15arhebt2u:4000_0: kasmāttasyaiva tatra śaktirnānyasya ityata āha “tayoḥ” mṛdādestantvādeśca “tajjanasvabhāvatvena”
SA15arhebt2u:4002_0: yadā tu sāmagrīṇāṃ parasparavilakṣaṇānāmapi śaktipratiniyamo neṣyate vilakṣaṇādapi
SA15arhebt2u:4007: tato vilakṣaṇasāmagrījanmanaḥ kāryasya kutaścit sāmyāt sarūpasyopalakṣaṇe 'pyanyādṛśataiveti sarvastādṛśastathāvidhajanmeti siddham /
SA15arhebt2u:4008_0: syānmatam- vilakṣaṇāyā api sāmagryāstallakṣaṇakāryajananaśaktiḥ samāneti tallakṣaṇaṃ
SA15arhebt2u:4008_1: kāryaṃ bhaviṣyati kasyāścideva ca tathābhāvānna yathoditadoṣāvasara ityata āha “tajjananaśaktisāmye tu” ityādi /
SA15arhebt2u:4012: abhyupagamyāpīdamāha- “yādṛśī hyagnisahakāriṇaḥ” tadādhīyamānavikārasye “ndhanasya” svabhedena dhūmabhedahetoḥ “śaktiḥ” ātmātiśayastādṛśyeva śakramūrddhno (Hbṭ 166)
SA15arhebt2u:4013: dhūmasya vā yadi tatsāmagrījanyadhūmavilakṣaṇakāryajananaśaktirātmātiśayalakṣaṇā tadā tacchaktisāmye tadevāgnīndhanādikamevārthānnāmāntareṇoktaṃ syāt,
SA15arhebt2u:4015: sa eva hyagnirya indhanavikāramādadhāno dhūmaṃ janayati,
SA15arhebt2u:4017: yadi ca śakramūrdvāderapi evaṃ bhavatābhyupagamyate tadā kevalaṃ nāmni vivādaḥ syāt,
SA15arhebt2u:4019_2: vā “na vyabhicarati” tadvilakṣaṇādanyato na bhavatīti kāryahetāvanvayavyatirekaniścayaḥ sidhyatīti /
SA15arhebt2u:4023_0: tadevaṃ karyahetau yato yadbhavadṛṣṭaṃ sakṛt pratyakṣānupalambhābhyāṃ tādṛśasya sarvasya
SA15arhebt2u:4023_1: tathāvidhādeva janma na tadvijātīyadityekasyā api kāryavyakteḥ kutaścid bhāvadarśane
SA15arhebt2u:4027: apare tu pratiṣedhyaviṣayajñānarūpeṇāpariṇāmamātmanaḥ tadanyavastuviṣayaṃ vijñānameva vābhāvasya gamakaṃ pratyakṣānumānābhyāṃ pramāṇāntaramāhurmīmāṃsakāḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:4031: abhāvāṃśe tu nāstīti jñānaṃ janayat tadabhāvapramāṇākhyāṃ labhate,
SA15arhebt2u:4036: tadevamanupalabdhau bhedaṃ gatā buddhayaḥ prativādināmiti tannirāsārthamanupalabdhisvarūpaṃ tāvadupadarśayannāha- “upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptasya” ityādi /
SA15arhebt2u:4041: yaḥ svabhāvaḥ satsvanyeṣūpalambhapratyayeṣu san pratyakṣa eva bhavatī'tyevaṃrūpā śāstrakṛtānyatra (Hbṭ 168)
SA15arhebt2u:4050: indriyatvāt tvagādivat kila prāpyakāri cakṣurityanumānataścākṣuṣo raśmirupalabhyate tasya pratyakṣato 'nupalabdhiḥ kathamabhāvavyavahāraṃ sādhayet? iti /
SA15arhebt2u:4052: yadā hyupalambhapratyayāntarasākalyaṃ svabhāvaviśeṣaśca yathokta upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptirucyate na mahattvādikaṃ tadā kuto vyabhicārāvakāśaḥ?
SA15arhebt2u:4055: nahi rūpādivyatiriktaṃ dravyaṃ tatpratibhāsavivekinākārāntareṇa svajñāne pratibhāsate /
SA15arhebt2u:4060: tato na mahattvaṃ dravyasyopalambhakaṃ rūpaṃ vā /
SA15arhebt2u:4063: na ca mahattvaṃ rūpaṃ vā dravyodayakāle 'bhyupagamyate,
SA15arhebt2u:4065: tacca pratilabdhātmakameva tathātāmanubhavatīti prathame kṣaṇe dravyaṃ nirguṇameva /
SA15arhebt2u:4066: na cāsya dvitīye kṣaṇe prāktanarūpatyāgo 'sti rūpāntaraṃ vāvirbhavati yataḥ prāgapratipannādhārabhāvaṃ (Hbṭ 169)
SA15arhebt2u:4072: , yataḥ svotkalitaṃ kāryaṃ janayat tathā vyapadiśyate /
SA15arhebt2u:4073: na caitat kṣaṇikatve sambhavati akṣaṇikatve vā prāga'nādhārasya paścādādhārābhāvaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:4074: samavāyikāraṇāsambhavādevānekadravyavattvamapyasmabhavi yasmādanekaṃ dravyamārambhakaṃ samavāyikāraṇātmanā yasya vidyate tadevaṃ vyapadiśyate /
SA15arhebt2u:4078_2: vā pratiṣedhyādanyasya sā “abhāvahetuḥ” kāryasya vyāpyasya ca “abhāvavyavahārahetuśca” /
SA15arhebt2u:4080: yā tvanupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptasyānupalabdhiḥ pratyakṣānumānanivṛttilakṣaṇā sā saṃśayahetuḥ pramāṇanivṛttāvapyarthābhāvāsiddheḥ,
SA15arhebt2u:4085_1: “atra” anupalabdhivākye yopalabdhiḥ śrūyate kriyārūpā sā yadā kartṛsthatayāpekṣyate
SA15arhebt2u:4086: upalabhamānaśca buddhīndriyadehakalāpa eva ca pūrvakṣaṇasaṅgṛhīta upalabdhijanaka ucyate /
SA15arhebt2u:4087: tathāhi- upalabdherjanaka āśrayo vā kartā parairucyate /
SA15arhebt2u:4088: na (Hbṭ 170) cendriyāderanyasya janakatvaṃ sambhavati yato 'nvayavyatirekanibandhanaḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvavyavahāraḥ,
SA15arhebt2u:4089: tau cānvayavyatirekau nendriyāderanyasya sambhavataḥ satsvindriyādiṣu niyamenopalabdherbhāvāt /
SA15arhebt2u:4090: yadi hīndriyādiṣu satsvapi kadācidupalabdhirnopajāyate tadā satsvapyanyeṣu sakaleṣu hetuṣu kāryānutpattiḥ kāraṇāntaravaikalyaṃ sūcayatīti tavdyatiriktakāraṇāntaraṃ parikalpyeta /
SA15arhebt2u:4099: tathāhi- upalabdheravināśa eva sthitirucyate na pātābhāvaḥ tasyā gurutvābhāvāt “saṃyogābhāvena gurutvāt patanam” iti ca pareṣāṃ kṛtāntaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:4121: paryudāsena pratiṣedhyasyārthasya rvajanena yā viśiṣṭe 'rthe vṛttistayā ,
SA15arhebt2u:4123: yatra vidheḥ prādhānyaṃ pratiṣedho 'rthagṛhītaḥ vidhibhāksvapadena nocyate ekavākyatā ca tatra paryudāsavṛttitā /
SA15arhebt2u:4126: ityevaṃ vākyenānyopalabdhervidhānāt anyopalabdhisāmarthyādeva vivakṣitopalabdheḥ pratiṣedhaḥ pratīyate /
SA15arhebt2u:4127: vivakṣitopalabdheranivartane tadapekṣayānyasyā vidhānāyogāt svapadena nañā vidhibhāṅ nocyate /
SA15arhebt2u:4129: anyaśabdena paryudāsāśrayeṇānyaśabdasyaiva vākye prayogāt anyā upalabdhiranupalabdhiriti /
SA15arhebt2u:4130: nañaśca subantena sāmarthyaṃ na tiṅantena ityekavākyatvaṃ '
SA15arhebt2u:4133: tatra hi pratiṣedhasya prādhānyaṃ vidhirarthād gamyate vākyabhedaḥ svapadena nañā pratiṣedhabhāk sambadhyate /
SA15arhebt2u:4134: tadevaṃ jñātṛdharmalakṣaṇāmanupalabdhiṃ vyākhyāya jñeyadharmalakṣaṇāṃ pratipādayannāha- “upalabhyamānadharmatve” ityādi /
SA15arhebt2u:4135: yadā karmasthakriyāpekṣayopalabhyamānasya vastuno dharma upalabdhirvivakṣyate tadā viṣayasvabhāva upalabdhirmantavyā /
SA15arhebt2u:4138: pratiṣedhyasya ghaṭāderyadātmaviṣayaṃ vijñānaṃ tajjanane yā yogyata tallakṣaṇo viṣayasvabhāva upalabdhiśabdenocyate /
SA15arhebt2u:4142: dharmadharmiṇośca bheda eva ityata āha- “yogyatāyāḥ” ityādi /
SA15arhebt2u:4143: yogyatā hi paramārthato bhāvarūpaiva na vasturūpāda bhidyate,
SA15arhebt2u:4144: anyathā bhāvo yogya eva na syāt /
SA15arhebt2u:4149: svaviṣayajñānajananayogyād yo 'nya upalambhajananayogya eva na tadviparītaḥ svabhāvo ghaṭaviviktapradeśarūpaḥ sa eva cātrānupalabdhiśabdenocyate /
SA15arhebt2u:4152: kathaṃ punarayaṃ naña anyārthavṛttiḥ sāmānyaśabdaḥ san ghaṭaviviktapradeśasya tajjñānasyaiva vā ghaṭaviviktasyānupalabdhitvaṃ paryudāsavṛttyā prakalpayati,
SA15arhebt2u:4156_1: ghaṭarūpāderupalabdhirbhavati “sa” ghaṭarūpādiḥ padārthaḥ “tatsaṃsṛṣṭaḥ” tena pradeśarūpādinā saṃsṛṣṭaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:4160: yadā hi pradeśarūpaṃ vyavadhānaviprakarṣādirahitaṃ vijñāne svākāraṃ samarpayati tadā ghaṭarūpamapi tatra tathāvidhaṃ svākāraṃ samarpayatyeva /
SA15arhebt2u:4161: yadi nāma yogyatā tasya tena tulyā svasvabhāvavyavasthitestu kathaṃ tatsaṃsṛṣṭatā?
SA15arhebt2u:4163: ekatra hi jñāne dvāvapi tau svākāradvāreṇa saṃsṛṣṭau na sākṣāt,
SA15arhebt2u:4165: kimiti punastat jñānaṃ padārthadvayākāramavaśyaṃ bhavati yatastayorjñānadvārakaḥ saṃsargaḥ?
SA15arhebt2u:4167: yāvetau tulyayogyatārūpau tau yadi santau bhavatastadā naivaikākāraniyatā pratipattirbhavati /
SA15arhebt2u:4169: na hyeṣa sambhavo 'sti- yattulyayogyatārūpayoreka eva pratibhāseta nāpara iti /
SA15arhebt2u:4170: tathāhi- aviśiṣṭatvād yogyatāyāḥ kastatra svākāraṃ na samarpayet? /
SA15arhebt2u:4177: karaṇadharma evāyaṃ yadekasminneva karmaṇi kriyāṃ niṣpādayatinānekatra,
SA15arhebt2u:4184: na ca pratikṣaṇaviśarāruṣu bhāveṣu paramārthataḥ kartṛkaraṇādibhāvo yuktaḥ kriyā vā kācit /
SA15arhebt2u:4185: na ca sarvakārakānvayavyatirekānuvidhāyini kārye kasyacidatiśayo 'sti yenāyaṃ kartā kā(ka)
SA15arhebt2u:4190: na hyasati tulyayogyatārūpatve yugapadekendriyajanitajñānapratibhāsitā rūparasavat sambhavatīti /
SA15arhebt2u:4194: ye tu 'tatrāpi pratyarthaṃ bhinnānyevaikendriyanimittānyekakālāni tadviṣayāṇāṃ yugapatsannihitānāṃ svajñāneṣu sāmarthyāviśeṣāt,
SA15arhebt2u:4196: iti varṇayanti teṣāmekendriyajatvenaikāyatanaviṣayatvena caikakāleṣvekatvavyapadeśo loke tathādhyavasāyādaupacārikaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:4197: yadi nāmaikajñānasaṃsargāt tatsaṃsṛṣṭastathāpi sāmānyena sarvamanyamayaṃ nañ kinna pratipadayati?
SA15arhebt2u:4199_0: yasmādaviśiṣṭatvādyogyatāyā yathoktena prakāreṇaikatra jñāne dvayorapi saṃsargaḥ
SA15arhebt2u:4199_1: tasmādaviśiṣṭaṃ yogyatārūpaṃ yayoḥ tata evaikajñānasaṃsargiṇau tau tasmāt tayorevaṃrūpayoḥ
SA15arhebt2u:4200: loke tu yadyapyaśeṣapadārthāntarāpekṣamanyatvaṃ nañā kvaciducyate vyāptinyāyasamāśrayāt,
SA15arhebt2u:4207: sa eva yadā kevalaḥ pradeśo yathoktaghaṭāpekṣaya tasmādanya ucyate tadā ghaṭaviviktapradeśajñānaṃ vānupalabdhiḥ,
SA15arhebt2u:4211: na tu tadviviktajñānameva yathāha kumārilaḥ “vijñānaṃ vānyavastuni” iti /
SA15arhebt2u:4212: yathā hyanyavastuviṣayaṃ jñanamanubhūyamānaṃ pratiyogismaraṇāpekṣaṃ tadabhāvavyavahāranibandhanaṃ tathā tadviviktaḥ pradeśo 'pi /
SA15arhebt2u:4214: yataḥ kealapradeśākārameva jñānaṃ mayā saṃvedyate na tu ghaṭākāramapi tasmādatra ghaṭo nāsti';
SA15arhebt2u:4217: yataḥ kevalaḥ pradeśo 'yaṃ dṛśyate na tu ghaṭasahitaḥ tasmānnāstyatra ghaṭaḥ'; ityevam /
SA15arhebt2u:4218: tasmādubhayornāstitājñānajanmani tulyaṃ sāmarthyamiti dvayorapi anupalabdhivyavasthā yukteti /
SA15arhebt2u:4219: tatra yadā tajjñānaṃ tadā jñātṛdharmalakṣaṇānupalabdhiḥ kartṛsthakriyāpekṣayā,
SA15arhebt2u:4221: evamanupalabdhiṃ paryudāsavṛttyā vyavasthāpya sādhyamasyā darśayannāha- “sā abhāvam” ityādi /
SA15arhebt2u:4222: sarvānyopalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptavivikte 'pi pradeśādau dṛśyamāne yatra ghaṭādau pratiyoginyarthitvādibhiḥ smṛtirasya bhavati tasyābhāvaṃ sādhayati,
SA15arhebt2u:4230: niḥśaṅkasya ca tatra pradeśe gamanāgamanalakṣaṇā pravṛttiriti /
SA15arhebt2u:4232: atreśvarasena- kumārilayorvacanāvakāśamāśaṅkaya siddhāntavyavasthāmeva kurvatā tanmate niraste 'pyāhatya tanmatanirāsārthamāha- “kathamanyabhāva” ityādi /
SA15arhebt2u:4233: īśvaraseno hi manyate- kārya- svabhāvahetubhyāṃ bhāvarūpābhyāṃ anupalabdheḥ pṛthakkaraṇādavaśyamabhāvarūpatvamasyāḥ,
SA15arhebt2u:4235: tvayā cānyasya pratiṣedhyaviviktasya pradeśādestajjñānasya vā bhāvarūpānupalabdhirākhyāyate tannūnamanyabhāvastadabhāvo yenaivamabhidhīyate /
SA15arhebt2u:4238: kumārilo 'pyevaṃ manyate- yeyaṃ jñātṛ- jñeyadharmalakṣaṇā dvidhānupalabdhirabhāvarūpā tvayocyate tasyā bhavatu nāstitājñānaṃ prati sādhanabhāvaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:4239: kintu sa evānyasya pratiṣedhyaviviktasya vastunaḥ pratiṣedhyajñānādanyasya vā tajjñānasya yo bhāvo bhāvāṃśaḥ sa kathamabhāvaḥ?
SA15arhebt2u:4249: na hi prasajyapratiṣedha evaiko nañarthaḥ kintu paryudāso 'pi /
SA15arhebt2u:4256: vastubhūtaiva pradeśasya sādhyata iti na svabhāvahetoḥ svabhāvānupalabdhirbhidyata iti /
SA15arhebt2u:4265: abhāvasya cānapekṣitasahakāriṇo anādheyātiśayatayā nāstīti jñānajanane nityaṃ tajjananaprasaṅgaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:4267: athavā tasya prasajyapratiṣedhātmana upalabdhyabhāvasya sādhanameva kiñcinna sidhyatīti /
SA15arhebt2u:4281: tathā hi- abhāvāṃśo 'pi pararūpāsaṃsṛṣṭatayaivābhāva iti vyapadiśyate,
SA15arhebt2u:4283: sā ca bhāvāṃśasyāpi samāneti sa evābhāvo 'stu tannimittasya samānatvāt kimanyenābhāvāṃśopagatena? /
SA15arhebt2u:4285: yata (Hbṭ 177) evam “iti” tasmād “anyabhāvo 'pi” anyasya vastuno bhāvo 'pi tvadabhimato bhāvāṃśo 'pi na kevalamabhāvāṃśastvanmatyābhāva iti vyapadiśyate 'smābhiḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:4286: tato bhāvāṃśasyābhāvarūpatā saṅgataiveti na kiñcid virudhyata iti /
SA15arhebt2u:4287: yaduktaṃ 'jñātṛjñeyadharmalakṣaṇayā svabhāvānupalabdhyā abhāvavyavahāra eva sādhyate nābhāvaḥ';
SA15arhebt2u:4291: iti dvitīye vyākhyāne pratiṣedhamātrasyānupalabdhi[ri]tyetasya sādhanaṃ darśayitumāha- “anyabhāvalakṣaṇa” ityādi /

SA15arhebt2u:5021: syānmatam- mā bhud bādhakapramāṇavṛttyabhāve hetoḥ sāmarthyam,

SA15arhebt2u:5033: siddhāntavādyāha- kiṃ nu vai heturbbādhāyā yā upalabdhistasyāḥ vibheti na punarbbādhāyā yena bādhāṃ sambhavantīmapyanādṛtya tadanupalabdhau satyāṃ prayoktavya iṣṭo bhavataḥ /

SA15arhebt2u:5042: siddhāntavādī satyāṃ bādhāyāṃ tadanupalambhe 'pi sādhyasiddhimasambhāvayan pṛcchati “sa kiṃ kvacid” ityādi /

SA15arhebt2u:5365: ityāha- “jñānasya” upalabdheryā sattā utpattiḥ tannibandhanatvājjñeyasya bhāvābhāvalakṣaṇasya sattāvyavasthāyāḥ svarūpavyavasthiteḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:5369: yata evaṃ tasmāt sarvatra śāstre loke vā jñeyasattāvyavasthaiva niścitagrahaṇaṃ vināpi “tatsādhanaṃ” tatsattāsādhanaṃ pramāṇam “ākarṣati” ākṣipatīti /
SA15arhebt2u:5370: kiñca, parārthatvācca śāstrapraṇayanasya tatsādhanapramāṇavṛttirākṣipyate iti sambandhaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:5371: kīdṛśaṃ punastacchāstrapraṇayanaṃ yat parārtharūpatayā svavyavasthāpitajñeyasattāsādhanaṃ pramāṇamākṣipati?
SA15arhebt2u:5372: ityāha- ” trirūpaṃ liṅgaṃ vaḥ saṃvādakaṃ prāpakaṃ” vāñchitasyārthasyeti /
SA15arhebt2u:5373_0: yadi nāmaivaṃrūpaṃ parārthaṃ śāstrapraṇayanaṃ tathāpi kathaṃ tat sādhanapramāṇavṛttimākṣipatītyāha-
SA15arhebt2u:5373_1: “tadrūpaṃ” tasya liṅgasya trirūpasya rūpaṃ svabhāvaṃ śāstroktaṃ ye pratipattāro na vidanti,
SA15arhebt2u:5376_0: yata evam “iti” tasmāt paropalakṣaṇatvādeva pareṣāṃ jñāpakatvādeva pravartake trirūpaliṅge
SA15arhebt2u:5376_1: jñānaṃ siddhamiti yadyapi niścitagrahaṇamatiricyate tathāpi tāveva liṅgasya sapakṣāsapakṣayorbhāvābhāvau
SA15arhebt2u:5379_0: pare darśanādarśanamātreṇa- ye darśanādarśane pratibandhasādhake na bhavataḥ- tanmātreṇa
SA15arhebt2u:5379_1: vyavasthāpayanti “yata eva iti” tasmātteṣāṃ vādināṃ niṣedhārtho 'yaṃ lakṣaṇe niścitaśabdaḥ
SA15arhebt2u:5380: yadi tu paravipratipattiḥ na syāt tadā naivāsau prayujyeteti /
SA15arhebt2u:5381: kimiti punarddarśanādarśanābhyāṃ bhāvābhāvaviṣayābhyāṃ sapakṣā [sa]pakṣayoḥ viśiṣṭau bhāvābhāvāvanvayavyatirekātmakau neṣyete ityāha- “satorapi” ityādi /
SA15arhebt2u:5382: satyapi kvacit sapakṣe bhāvadarśane hetoḥ kvaciccāsapakṣe 'bhāvadarśane 'sa śyāmaḥ,
SA15arhebt2u:5385: tathā hi- anvayo nāma sarvatra satyeva sādhye hetorbhāvo (Hbṭ 225)
SA15arhebt2u:5387: na ca kvacit sati sādhye hetorbhāvadarśane 'pi tanmātreṇa tathābhāvaḥ sarvatra bhavati,
SA15arhebt2u:5389: tathā kvacit sādhyābhimatasyābhāve satyabhāvadarśane 'pi hetoḥ sarvatra tadabhāve 'vaśyamabhāvaḥ,
SA15arhebt2u:5391_1: sidhyataḥ nānyatheti vipratipattinirāsārthameva niścitagrahaṇaṃ kṛtamityupadarśayannāha- “tasmāt” ityādi /
SA15arhebt2u:5394: asatyāṃ tu vipratipattau tanna kartavyameveti pratipādya ata eva nyāyāt jñātatvaṃ rūpāntaraṃ na bhavatīti darśayannāha- “yato 'pi“ityādi /
SA15arhebt2u:5398: yathā pakṣadharmatvavacanenaiva hetorupanayasyārtho 'vagatastasya dharmiṇi hetoḥ sadbhāvapradarśanātmakatvāt,
SA15arhebt2u:5399: pakṣadharmavacanasya ca tadrūpatvāt tataḥ pṛthagupanayo rūpāntaraṃ na bhavati;
SA15arhebt2u:5403: yadi trairūpyavacanenaiva sāmarthyājjñānaṃ labhyata iti tat tataḥ pṛthag na vaktavyam “hantaḥ” tarhi anvayāt pṛthag vyatireko na vaktavyaḥ vyatirekācca pṛthaganvayaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:5407: tathā jñātatvasyāpi trairūpyād gamyamānasyāpi pṛthagvacanaṃ kartavyamiti /
SA15arhebt2u:5414: na ca tau parasparamākṣipataḥ parasparamantarbhavato vidhipratiṣedharūpayorbhinnasvabhāvatvāt /
SA15arhebt2u:5415: na ca yo yato bhinnasvabhāvaḥ sa tatrāntarbhūto yukto /
SA15arhebt2u:5416: nanu ca yadyanvayavyatirekayorbhinnarūpatā kathaṃ tarhi trirūpaṃ liṅgamucyate? /
SA15arhebt2u:5420: yato yathānvayavyatirekau vyavasthāpyete na vā nayo (pyete tathā tayo)
SA15arhebt2u:5425: vyāvṛttibhede 'pi ca paramārthato bhedo nāstītyekaṃ liṅgaṃ trirūpamityucyate iti /
SA15arhebt2u:5430: anvayamukhena vyatirekamukheṇa vā prayuktamekaṃ vākyamubhayamanvayaṃ vyatirekaṃ ca bhinnalakṣaṇameva gamayatītyucyate 'smabhirnaiko 'rthaḥ svabhāvo dvitīyasyocyate,
SA15arhebt2u:5432: atra para āha- “na tu tatraiva” ityādi /
SA15arhebt2u:5443: tataścaikenaiva sapakṣāsapakṣayorbhāvābhāvapratipādakena prativiśiṣṭena lakṣaṇavākyenobhayagaterdvitīyavacanaṃ na kartavyamiti /
SA15arhebt2u:5463: vaidharmyaprayoge ca sādharmyavacanamiti na punarekābhidhānenānavagatasya rūpāntarasya pratipādanārtham /
SA15arhebt2u:5464_0: na ca tathā trairūpyavacanena jñānanibandhanena jñeyasattāvyavasthāyāḥ propalakṣaṇārthena
SA15arhebt2u:5464_2: punarvacane na kiñcit prayojanamastīti nāsya pṛthagvacanaṃ yuktamiti /
SA15arhebt2u:5465_1: tata evaivakavākyārthāntarbhāvādityata āha- “na punaḥ kevalau” ekavākyārthānapekṣau
SA15arhebt2u:5467: tayoḥ parasparākṣepe kevalayorapi tatprasaṅga ityata āha- “niyamavantau ca” sāvadhāraṇavākyapratipāditau “na kevalau” kintu sahitāveva /
SA15arhebt2u:5470: tadevaṃ sāvadhāraṇena vākyena naiva kevalo 'nvayo vyatireko vābhidhīyate /
SA15arhebt2u:5471: tadantarbhāvāttu dvitīyagatiḥ kintu parasparāntarbhūtāveva sahitāvekena vākyenābhidhīyete iti pratipādyopasaṃharannāha- “tasmāt” tatraiva sapakṣa eva bhāva (Hbṭ 228)
SA15arhebt2u:5472: ityanena vākyena na sapakṣe bhāva evocyate /
SA15arhebt2u:5475: tathā cetareṇāpyasapakṣe 'bhāva eveti vacanena nābhāva eva kevala ucyate kintu sapakṣe bhāvo 'pi,
SA15arhebt2u:5476: yena kevalavacanena bhāvo 'bhāvo vā tadātmakatayā dvitīyamākṣiped yato 'nayoḥ pṛthagvacanaṃ na syāt /
SA15arhebt2u:5477: tasmād yadānvayavyatirekau bhavābhāvāvabhipretau tadā tau bhinnarūpāveveti kathaṃ tayoḥ na pṛthaktvam? /
SA15arhebt2u:5478: atha niyamavatā vākyenābhihitau tadaikavākyādevobhayagateḥ pṛthagvacanaṃ na kartavyameva /
SA15arhebt2u:5480: syānmatam- yathānvayavyatirekau bhāvābhāvalakṣaṇau na parasparātmakau tataśca tayoḥ parasparato rūpāntaratvam,
SA15arhebt2u:5481: evaṃ paropalakṣaṇaśāstrapratipāditāt trailakṣaṇyād bhidyata eva jñānam,
SA15arhebt2u:5488: trairūpyaviṣayāṃ pratītiṃ kāryante yena śāstreṇa tato yat trailakṣaṇyaṃ pratīyate āgṛhītajñānaṃ tasmādavyatirekādāgṛhītajñāne trailakṣaṇye 'ntarbhāvāditi yāvat,
SA15arhebt2u:5490: tadayamatra samudāyārthaḥ- yadi jñātatvaṃ jñānaśabdapravṛttinimittaṃ uktena prakāreṇa jñānamevocyate tadā talliṃgasyānātmabhūtamiti na tallakṣaṇam /
SA15arhebt2u:5491: athāvi(pi) jñānāpekṣaḥ karmabhāvo jñātatvamucyate tadāpi jñeyasattāvyavasthāyā jñānasattānibandhanatvāt trairūpyavyavasthaiva tatsattāvyavasthāpakaṃ jñānamākṣipati /
SA15arhebt2u:5492: tatastadapekṣo 'pi karmabhāvo 'nuktasiddha iti na tadvacanaṃ pṛthakkartavyam /
SA15arhebt2u:5494: tadevamabādhitaviṣayatvādikaṃ rūpatrayaṃ nirākṛtya nigamayannāha- “tasmānna hetuḥ ṣaḍlakṣaṇaḥ /
